title: feat(mobile): Setup React Native project structure
body:
## Summary

Configure React Native/Expo project with proper organization and navigation.

## Changes

- Setup React Navigation with stack navigator
- Created screens and components directories
- Configured TypeScript strict mode
- Added global styles and theme
- Setup SafeAreaView for iOS notch handling

## Type of Change

- [x] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)

## Testing

- [x] App runs on iOS simulator
- [x] App runs on Android emulator
- [x] TypeScript compiles without errors
- [x] Navigation works correctly
- [x] SafeAreaView handles notches properly

## Mobile Testing

- [x] Tested on iOS (simulator)
- [x] Tested on Android (emulator)
- [x] Tested on Expo Go (physical device)
- [x] Portrait orientation works
- [x] Landscape orientation works (if applicable)

## Checklist

- [x] Code follows project style guidelines
- [x] Self-review of code completed
- [x] Changes generate no new warnings
- [x] Mobile-specific considerations addressed
- [x] Performance tested on lower-end devices

## Related Issues

Closes #1

---
